rules.name: TOS
rules.description: We strictly follow the Discord TOS, any content violating this will be removed and you will be kicked / banned.

rules.name: No Harrassment
rules.description: No harassing other members of the Gulag, this includes (and isn't limited to) sexism, racism, derogatory remarks etc.

rules.name: No spamming
rules.description: No spam like posts or spamming of any kind will be tolerated.

rules.name: No Advertising
rules.description: No avertising of any kind in the Gulag, social links are allowed but any content resembling advertisements will be removed, and you will be punished. If you're unsure about a post, check with an Admin.

rules.name: Respect
rules.description: Don't be a d**k. There's no particular criteria for this rule, just don't be toxic!
